A SENT PRE ENCE is an avant-garde jewelry brand based on the idea of intellectual beauty and singularity. The brand name is ‘ABSENT PRESENCE’ missing letters ‘B’ and ‘S’.

The concept of the brand lies in the transformation and reinterpretation of jewelry classic forms, respecting the prints of past eras. What if we transform the existing jewelry sample of the 17th century? Would we get a new jewelry masterpiece? Is it possible to create a ring from three existing ones? By answering these questions we breathe life into old things, letting them continually serve us.

Revealing the beauty of invisible, A SENT PRE ENCE presents its debut collection ‘TIME’. The collection includes male and female jewelry in the palette of silver, gold, copper, dark blue and white. Minimalist rings, pendants of Canadian coins with a crocodile image, two-headed lion rings crustated with sapphires look like set in motion, creating the illusion as if time stood still.
